body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Cast Satyr Nyx-Smith
2. Once on battlefield, see it cannot attack on turn it was cast 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? This creature has haste, should be able to attack on the turn cast What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.48 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Not a bug so much as missing attribute. Please provide any additional information below.
author: [zer...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/113033908417053535498/)
title: Satyr Nyx-Smith - needs haste

comments.body:
Hmm, looking at the code Satyr Nyx-Smith has haste, and testing it now the haste is working.
Could there have been something else on the battlefield to prevent it from attacking?
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body:
Found it - The haste ability was missing before it was converted to purely scripted text on April 11th. Try using a more recent build from here https://buildhive.cloudbees.com/job/melvinzhang/job/magarena/ That should fix the issue, and also add a fair few new cards as well ;)

Thanks for the feedback, and enjoy!

**Status:** Done  
  **Owner:** ShawnieBoyUK
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
